attributes.action: allow natural fathers to have contact with their child if they have not done anything wrong
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
allow natural fathers to see their children if they have done nothing wrong.
if no evidence exists that the father did anything then the father should be able to see their children.
be it supervised meeting or not, this should not be ignored as i am going through this rubbish myself with the likes of solicitors, courts, judges and cafcass.......it doesnt work. how can children of the age of 12 decide what is right?
please consider this.
thankyou.
